JobFullDesc:
The Finance Manager will oversee the creation and maintenance of ongoing financial reporting, as well preparation of monthly financial reporting, monthly close and regular budgeting and forecasting. They will also be responsible for overseeing a portfolio of external client and intercompany contracts including client’s fee calculation and tracking, application of proper revenue recognition methodology and clients' contracts management.

Job Responsibilities


Partner with the business leads and provide monthly, quarterly and annual projection on both revenue and staffing  
Manage external client and intercompany contracts and application of proper revenue recognition methodology per GAAP and IPG Corporate Policy  
Produce and Analyze Client P&Ls  
Manage monthly contract accounting and review process  
Document, implement and maintain accounting controls for SOX compliance  
Analyze and optimize WIP balances, revenue and production billings, and intercompany revenue transfers  
Primary point of contact for revenue related inquiries from financial management, auditors, and parent company (IPG)  
Review and Analyze monthly fee actualizations  
Improve utilization of financial systems in revenue analysis, client billing, and intercompany billing  
Look for ways to improve forecasts by models or process improvements 
Review variance commentary and rewrite if necessary for month end, quarter end and re-forecasting submissions 
Collaborate closely with client business partners in managing the financials of the account 
Collaborate with senior leadership and HR in staffing the business appropriately 
SOW Drafting and Reviewing in conjunction with Legal 
Oversee invoice processing in Ariba 
Perform ad hoc analysis as directed by FP&A FD, and CFO 
Preparation of consolidated forecasts and reporting for global roll up of Product and Engineering numbers 
Preparation of Annual and Revised Budget forecasts 
Work on pricing media services for New Business projects 
Building of pricing and commercial models 
New clients onboarding protocols in all systems 
Adherence to client SOW’s 
Work on pricing media services for New Business projects  
Share innovative ideas for better work practices  

Desired Skills & Experience


5+ years of experience in finance with a strong understanding of financial statements and GAAP and SOX 
BA/BS with major or minor in Accounting or Finance  
Supervisory experience required  
Highly skilled in MS Excel. Comfortable working with large data sets, pivot tables, and performing v-lookups 
Experience in SAP and Hyperion preferred but not required.  
Media industry and Advertising experience a significant “plus”
